item.title: Maps
item.description: R Markdown getbb("Phoenix United States") ## min max ## x -112.32403 -111.92552 ## y 33.29037 33.91838 streets <- getbb("Phoenix United States") %>% opq() %>% add_osm_feature(key = "highway", value = c("motorway", "primary")) %>% osmdata_sf() Including Plots small_streets <- getbb("Phoenix United States")%>% opq()%>% add_osm_feature(key = "highway", value = c("secondary", "tertiary")) %>% osmdata_sf() river <- getbb("Phoenix United States")%>% opq()%>% add_osm_feature(key = "waterway", value = "river") %>% osmdata_sf() ggplot() + geom_sf(data = streets$osm_lines, inherit.
